Midea Group was set up in 1968, being in the home appliance business since 1980 and had the brand “Midea” registered in 1981. At present, Midea Group has 130, 000 employees and owns a dozen brands including Midea, Little Swan and GMCC. With 20 domestic production bases, it has established manufacturing bases and joint ventures production bases in 6 countries. Besides, Midea Group has set up more than 60 overseas branches and its products are exported to over 200 countries and regions. \n\n The sales revenue of Midea Group in 2013 reached USD 19.5 billion, among which export sales contributed USD 7.4 billion. In 2013 R&F Global Ranking, Midea ranked No.5 in China, its brand value is evaluated to be USD 10.5 billion.
